game.name: SeArena
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hoist the sails and prove who rules the waves! Pirate Arena is a fast-paced naval PvP brawler inspired by the chaotic fun of Sea of Thieves. One player becomes the Host, setting rules and map hazards, while rival captains trade broadsides, boarding actions, and daring maneuvers until only.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hoist the sails and prove who rules the waves! Pirate Arena is a fast-paced naval PvP brawler inspired by the chaotic fun of Sea of Thieves. One player becomes the Host, setting rules and map hazards, while rival captains trade broadsides, boarding actions, and daring maneuvers until only.
